feature.name: hard_reset_disable
feature.doc: Init the device without hard reset.

define.name: max_nof_cores
define.doc: Max number of cores in the device.

define.name: max_nof_system_ports
define.doc: Max number of system ports, may use software to indicate invalid system port

define.name: invalid_system_port
define.doc: invalid system port - defined as the last system port

define.name: invalid_fap_id
define.doc: invalid FAP id - defined as the last FAP id

numeric.name: nof_cores
numeric.doc: Number of cores in the device.

numeric.name: core_max_nof_bits
numeric.doc: Max number of cores bits to represent core. should be log2(nof_cores)

numeric.name: system_ref_core_clock_khz
numeric.doc: Specifies system reference clock speed in kHz.

numeric.name: nof_faps
numeric.doc: Number of supported faps in the system.

numeric.name: emulation_system
numeric.doc: Checking if the device is ran on emulation.

numeric.name: bist_enable
numeric.doc: Determines if to run Memory Built-In Self-Test (MBIST) of internal memories (tables) during startup.
